articles.description: An artistically inclined pilot created a syringe-shaped flight path above the skies of southern Germany, ahead of the start of a nationwide inoculation drive against Covid-19.
articles.content:
Pilot Samy Kramer said he wanted to do something creative while logging flight hours in his Diamond DA20 Katana, a small two-seater light aircraft. 
“At the moment, I have to collect a lot of flying… [+1346 chars]

articles.title: Twelve Covid-19 cases linked to Highland pub as health chiefs issue advice - Inverness Courier
articles.description: Twelve coronavirus cases have been linked to a Highland pub which voluntarily closed last week.
articles.content:
The Mallard's landlord took the decision to voluntarily close when he became aware an infected customer had visited the premises on Friday, December 18.
